tasks.set: deno run --allow-read --allow-write src/main.ts set user:1 '{ "name" : "Alice"}' --path data.bkv
tasks.get: deno run --allow-read --allow-write src/main.ts get user:1 --path data.bkv
tasks.delete: deno run --allow-read --allow-write src/main.ts delete user:1 --path data.bkv
tasks.start: deno task version && deno task help && deno task init && deno task set && deno task get && deno task list && deno task delete && deno task list
